title: Ticket #3099: Bug in unparsing quoted ClassAd attribute names
description: ClassAd attribute names can contain any character. If they contain characters other than alphanumerics and underscore, the name must be enclosed in single quotes. The native unparser doesn't do the proper quoting if the first character of the attribute name is something other than an alphabet letter or underscore.
remarks:
